thread.title: Celebs React to Lady Gaga's Epic Super Bowl 2017 Halftime Show- Read the Tweets!
thread.title_full: Celebs React to Lady Gaga's Epic Super Bowl 2017 Halftime Show- Read the Tweets!

author: Just Jared
title: Celebs React to Lady Gaga's Epic Super Bowl 2017 Halftime Show- Read the Tweets!
text:
Lady Gaga performed her spectacular Super Bowl Halftime show and celebs took to Twitter to react!
Everyone from Brooklyn Decker to Nick Jonas , from Colton Haynes to Donnie Wahlberg , and many more!
“Two words — #LadyGaGa That may be three words, but there’s really only one word for that performance — #EPIC #PepsiHalftime,” Donnie wrote.
“YES @LadyGaga just DID THAT!! #SuperBowl ❤❤👑👑,” Fergie posted.
“Wow @ladygaga killed the halftime show. Well done #Superbowl,” Nick wrote on his page.
In case you somehow missed her performance, click HERE for Gaga ‘s Halftime show.
Check out more tweets below!
🙌GAGA👏
— Brooklyn Decker (@BrooklynDecker) February 6, 2017 
Two words — #LadyGaGa 
That may be three words, but there's really only one word for that performance — #EPIC #PepsiHalftime 
— Donnie Wahlberg (@DonnieWahlberg) February 6, 2017 
That was the best halftime show I've ever seen @ladygaga . We r freakin out over here!!! 
— Colton Haynes (@ColtonLHaynes) February 6, 2017 
Wow @ladygaga killed the halftime show. Well done #Superbowl 
— Nick Jonas (@nickjonas) February 6, 2017 
Congratulations @ladygaga !! That was AMAZING! Slayed my life!! ❤️❤️❤️
— Rita Ora (@RitaOra) February 6, 2017 
YES @LadyGaga just DID THAT!! #SuperBowl ❤❤👑👑
— Fergie (@Fergie) February 6, 2017
